data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Nutrition is a crucial component to a healthy life. A pro___ diet c__ mean t__ difference bet____ energy a__ exhaustion. Poor nutr_____ leads t_ obesity, heart dis____, a__ other dise____. It is crucial to balance your intake of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates in order to achieve a balanced diet.
data.fullContent: Nutrition is a crucial component to a healthy life. A proper diet can mean the difference between energy and exhaustion. Poor nutrition leads to obesity, heart disease, and other diseases. It is crucial to balance your intake of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates in order to achieve a balanced diet.
data.answer: 营养是健康生活的重要组成部分。适当的饮食意味着能量和疲惫的区别。营养不良会导致肥胖、心脏病和其他疾病。平衡蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物的摄入是实现平衡饮食的关键。
